sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col>
      <v-list
          subheader
      >
        <v-subheader
            v-for="bg in backgrounds"
            :key=bg.name
            class="mt-4"
        >
          <v-icon class="mr-4">
            {{ bg.icon }}
          </v-icon>
          {{ bg.name }}
          <v-switch
              class="ml-2"
          ></v-switch>
        </v-subheader>
      </v-list>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>
<!-- PREMIOS - FORMACION - EXP PROF -->
<!-- SUB GRUPO -->
<script>
export default {
  name: "ActorEditBackground",
  data: () => ({
    backgrounds: [
      {
        name: 'Formacion',
        icon: 'mdi-school-outline',
        active: false
      },
      {
        name: 'Experiencia Profesional',
        icon: 'mdi-movie-open',
        active: false
      },
      {
        name: 'Premios',
        icon: 'mdi-trophy-award',
        active: false
      },
    ]
  }),
  props: {
    actorId: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
  },
  watch: {
    actorId: {
      handler: function () {
        this.retrieveBackgroundInfo();
      }
    }
  },
  methods:{
    retrieveBackgroundInfo(){
      console.log("todo bg info");
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
